definition: frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream
one man's meat is another man's poison (idiom)
pinyin: jia3 zhi1 mi4 tang2 , yi3 zhi1 pi1 shuang1

sentences.english: Is it true the arsenic blackens silver?
The boss, please give me a catty of strawberry in disguise.
sentences.chinese: 老板，请给我一斤草莓味的砒霜。

sentences.english: Roderigo rent his chains asunder manfully, and Hugo died in agonies of remorse and arsenic , with a wild, "Ha! Ha!"
sentences.chinese: 在悔恨和砒霜的折磨下死去。

sentences.english: Study: Sunbeds as deadly as arsenic.
sentences.chinese: 英国研究表明，阳光浴好比吃砒霜。

sentences.english: Don’t forget it is also kin to arsenic, chemically.
sentences.chinese: 这种化学性是和砒霜类似的。

sentences.english: His wife poisoned him with arsenic.
sentences.chinese: 他妻子用砒霜把他毒死了。

definition: dichlorvos C4H7Cl2PO4, organic phosphate used as insecticide (loanword)/also called dimethyl dichloro-vinyl phosphate DDVP
to cure ills with poison (TCM)/to fight evil with evil/set a thief to catch a thief/to fight fire with fire
croton (Croton tiglium), evergreen bush of Euphorbiaceae family 大戟科[da4 ji3 ke1]/croton seed, a strong purgative
